General.Name: Jiangsu Sidike New Materials Sci Te
General.Description: Jiangsu Sidike New Materials Science & Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells multifunctional coating composite material in China. It offers functional films, such as precision protective films and releasing material; tapes and adhesives, including double-sided, single-sided, conductive/shielding and mylar tapes, optical clear adhesives, and explosion-proofing films; graphite and graphene material; and film packaging material. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Taicang, China.
General.Address: No. 6 Shuangyang West Road, Suqian, China
